SignUpPage.title: Sign Up
SignUpPage.name: Username
SignUpPage.question: Do you have an account?
SignUpPage.agreementsCheckText: I agree to the <link1>Terms of Service</link1> and <link2>Privacy Policy</link2>
SignUpPage.sentEmailConfirm: We have sent a link to confirm your email to
SignUpPage.nameExist: User with this username is already registered
SignUpPage.emailExist: User with this email is already registered

SignInPage.title: Sign In
SignInPage.question: Don’t have an account?
SignInPage.error400: The email or password are incorrect. Try again please

EmailExpiredPage.title: Email verification link expired
EmailExpiredPage.desc: Looks like the verification link has expired. Not to worry, we can send the link again

ForgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot Password
ForgotPasswordPage.desc: Enter your email address and we will send you further instructions
ForgotPasswordPage.descAfterSend: The link has been sent by email. If you don’t receive an email send link again
ForgotPasswordPage.modal: We have sent a link to confirm your email to
ForgotPasswordPage.error400: Incorrect input data by field or reCaptcha

MergerOfAccountsPage.title: Merger of Accounts
MergerOfAccountsPage.descAfter: is already in the system. Could we merge this accounts?

VerificationInvalidPage.title: Email verification link invalid
VerificationInvalidPage.desc: Looks like the verification link has expired. Not to worry, we can send the link again

RecoveryPage.title: Create New Password
RecoveryPage.desc: Your password must be between 6 and 20 characters
RecoveryPage.newPasswordSuccess: You have successfully changed your password

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.

MyProfilePage.aboutMe: Fill in your info, while it's empty

UnsubscribeModal.title: Unfollow
UnsubscribeModal.question: Do you really want to unfollow from this user

DeleteModal.title: Delete Subscriber
DeleteModal.question: Do you really want to delete a Following

DeleteAvatarModal.title: Delete a profile photo
DeleteAvatarModal.question: Do you really want to delete your profile photo

LogoutModal.title: Log Out
LogoutModal.question: Are you really want to log out of your account

userName.min: Username must contain at least 6 characters

firstName.matches: First Name can only contain alphabetic characters
firstName.min: First Name must contain at least 1 character
firstName.max: First Name must not exceed 50 characters

lastName.matches: Last Name can only contain alphabetic characters
lastName.min: Last Name must contain at least 1 character
lastName.max: Last Name must not exceed 50 characters

aboutMe.matches: User description can only contain alphabetic characters, numbers and special characters
aboutMe.max: About yourself should not exceed 200 characters
